messages.subject: Re: Pets/dogs
messages.msgSnippet: ***Sometimes I feel so guilty with the whole unschooling thing--like I should be able to give them so much more than I m capable of giving.*** Ah, that s not
messages.messageBody:
***Sometimes I feel so guilty with the whole unschooling thing--like I
should be able to give them so much more than I'm capable of giving.***

Ah, that's not the unschooling Sheila... that's just motherhood. You'd
feel that way if they were in school too, and you'd have all the guilt of
making them do homework instead of enjoying family time.

Deb L, who's been reading for two hours and still has a hundred messages
to read... trying to catch up after a weekend of gardening and trampoline
bouncing. <g>
